summary: Fix for the Atronach Forge so it can create any random daedric weapon (not just warhammers or war axes)
descriptionHtml:
Simple, is a fix so the Atronach Forge can create any random daedric weapon with any enchantment. It also fixes the \"ebony boots to deadric\" conversion, so they are now equippable.

The weapons are split in two groups:

Two handed weapons or heavy:
Daedric Greatsword
Daedric Battleaxe
Daedric Warhammer
Daedric Bow

One handed weapons or light:
Daedric Dagger
Daedric Sword
Daedric War Axe
Daedric Mace

The recipe for the weapons are the same as vanilla, except that if you want a two handed weapon you\'re going to need a silver greatsword, and if you want a one hand weapon you\'re going to need a silver sword.

Example:

A Grand or greater soul + an ebony ingot + a daedra\'s heart + a silver greatsword will give a you a random weapon with a random enchantment from the 2 handed group (greatsword, battleaxe, warhammer or bow)

While a grand soul or greater soul+ an ebony ingor + a deadra\'s heart + a silver sword will give you a random weapom with a random enchantment from the 1 handed group (dagger, sword, war axe or mace)

If you have any problem or issue please report it!
author: controlremote
